alert.note: Alert for Eastern Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 19 at 1:48PM AKDT until March 19 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing snow occurring. Visibilities reduced to one half mile or less at times. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Aleutians. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers, heavy at times, will continue through this afternoon, then slowly diminish. Visibility will fluctuate up and down over short periods of time due to variability in shower and wind intensity.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
